body_html: Could you try locating tf.gradients call in the model code and add a new argument: aggregation_method=1 (or 2 which might be better). This is an experimental feature that optimizes memory consumption of gradient updates for RNNs. I was able to train much larger models with this parameter. There is a chance it will slow down your code somewhat, though.
